title: Explore Southern Italy with a landing at the revamped Foggia Airport (LOBF)!
description:
In this short we will look at Foggia Airport (ICAO: LIBF) which became available as an addon in the marketplace for MSFS 2020 this week. 

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
https://youtu.be/VSq_XHCmbuM
